papers.title: Sub-session hijacking on the web: Root causes and prevention
papers.authors: Stefano Calzavara, Alvise Rabitti, Michele Bugliesi
papers.abstract: Since cookies act as the only proof of a user identity, web sessions are particularly vulnerable to session hijacking attacks, where the browser run by a given user sends requests associated to the identity of another user. When n > 1 cookies are used to implement a session, there might actually be n sub-sessions running at the same website, where each cookie is used to retrieve part of the state information related to the session. Sub-session hijacking breaks the ideal view of the existence of a unique user session by selectively hijacking m sub-sessions, with m < n. This may reduce the security of the session to the security of its weakest sub-session. In this paper, we take a systematic look at the root causes of sub-session hijacking attacks and we introduce sub-session linking as a possible defense mechanism. Out of two flavors of sub-session linking desirable for security, which we call intra-scope and inter-scope sub-session linking respectively, only the former is relatively smooth to implement. Luckily, we also identify programming practices to void the need for inter-scope sub-session linking. We finally present Warden, a server-side proxy which automatically enforces intra-scope sub-session linking on incoming HTTP(S) requests, and we evaluate it in terms of protection, performances, backward compatibility and ease of deployment.
papers.abstract_zh: 因为cookies是用户身份的唯一证明，所以web会话特别容易受到会话劫持攻击，即给定用户运行的浏览器发送与另一个用户的身份相关联的请求。当使用n > 1个cookie来实现一个会话时，实际上可能有n个子会话在同一个网站上运行，其中每个cookie用于检索与该会话相关的部分状态信息。子会话劫持通过选择性地劫持m个子会话，打破了唯一用户会话存在的理想观点，其中m < n。这可能将会话的安全性降低到其最弱子会话的安全性。在本文中，我们系统地研究了子会话劫持攻击的根源，并引入子会话链接作为一种可能的防御机制。出于安全考虑，有两种类型的子会话链接，我们分别称之为作用域内和作用域间子会话链接，只有前者实现起来相对容易。幸运的是，我们还确定了编程实践来避免作用域间子会话链接的需要。最后，我们介绍了Warden，这是一个服务器端代理，它可以在传入的HTTP(S)请求上自动强制执行作用域内子会话链接，我们从保护、性能、向后兼容性和易于部署等方面对它进行了评估。
papers.title_zh: web上的子会话劫持:根源与防范

papers.title: DABKE: Secure deniable attribute-based key exchange framework
papers.authors: Yangguang Tian, Yingjiu Li, Guomin Yang, Willy Susilo, Yi Mu, Hui Cui, Yinghui Zhang
papers.abstract: We introduce the first deniable attribute-based key exchange (DABKE) framework that is resilient to impersonation attacks. We define the formal security models for DABKE framework, and propose a generic compiler that converts any attribute-based key exchanges into deniable ones. We prove that it can achieve session key security and user privacy in the standard model, and strong deniability in the simulation-based paradigm. In particular, the proposed generic compiler ensures: 1) a dishonest user cannot impersonate other user’s session participation in conversations since implicit authentication is used among authorized users; 2) an authorized user can plausibly deny his/her participation after secure conversations with others; 3) the strongest form of deniability is achieved using one-round communication between two authorized users.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了第一个可否认的基于属性的密钥交换(DABKE)框架，它可以抵抗假冒攻击。我们为DABKE框架定义了形式化的安全模型，并提出了一个通用的编译器，将任何基于属性的密钥交换转换为可否认的密钥交换。我们证明了它在标准模型下可以实现会话密钥安全和用户隐私，在基于仿真的范例下可以实现强可否认性。特别地，所提出的通用编译器确保:1)不诚实的用户不能在会话中冒充其他用户的会话参与，因为隐式认证在授权用户之间使用；2)授权用户可以在与其他人进行安全对话之后，貌似有理地否认他/她的参与；3)最强形式的可否认性是使用两个授权用户之间的单向通信来实现的。
papers.title_zh: DABKE:安全的可否认的基于属性的密钥交换框架

papers.title: A method for unbounded verification of privacy-type properties
papers.authors: Lucca Hirschi, David Baelde, Stéphanie Delaune
papers.abstract: In this paper, we consider the problem of verifying anonymity and unlinkability in the symbolic model, where protocols are represented as processes in a variant of the applied pi calculus, notably used in the ProVerif tool. Existing tools and techniques do not allow to verify directly these properties, expressed as behavioral equivalences. We propose a different approach: we design two conditions on protocols which are sufficient to ensure anonymity and unlinkability, and which can then be effectively checked automatically using ProVerif. Our two conditions correspond to two broad classes of attacks on unlinkability, i.e. data and control-flow leaks. This theoretical result is general enough that it applies to a wide class of protocols based on a variety of cryptographic primitives. In particular, using our tool, UKano, we provide the first formal security proofs of protocols such as BAC and PACE (e-passport), Hash-Lock (RFID authentication), etc. Our work has also lead to the discovery of new attacks, including one on the LAK protocol (RFID authentication) which was previously claimed to be unlinkable (in a weak sense).
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们考虑在符号模型中验证匿名性和不可链接性的问题，其中协议被表示为应用pi演算的变体中的进程，特别是在ProVerif工具中使用。现有的工具和技术不允许直接验证这些表示为行为等价的属性。我们提出了一个不同的方法:我们在协议上设计了两个条件，这两个条件足以确保匿名性和不可链接性，并且可以使用ProVerif自动有效地检查。我们的两个条件对应于对不可链接性的两大类攻击，即数据和控制流泄漏。这个理论结果是足够普遍的，它适用于基于各种密码原语的各种协议。特别地，使用我们的工具UKano，我们提供了诸如BAC和PACE(电子护照)、Hash-Lock (RFID认证)等协议的第一个形式化安全证明。我们的工作还导致了新攻击的发现，包括一个对LAK协议(RFID认证)的攻击，该协议以前被认为是不可链接的(在弱意义上)。
papers.title_zh: 一种隐私类型属性的无界验证方法

papers.title: Last man standing: Static, decremental and dynamic resiliency via controller synthesis
papers.authors: Matteo Zavatteri, Luca Viganò
papers.abstract: The workflow satisfiability problem is the problem of finding an assignment of users to tasks (i.e., a plan) so that all authorization constraints are satisfied. The workflow resiliency problem is a dynamic workflow satisfiability problem coping with the absence of users. If a workflow is resilient, it is of course satisfiable, but the vice versa does not hold. There are three levels of resiliency: in static resiliency, up to k users might be absent before the execution starts and never become available for that execution; in decremental resiliency, up to k users might be absent before or during execution and, again, they never become available for that execution; in dynamic resiliency, up to k users might be absent before executing any task and they may in general turn absent and available continuously, before or during the execution. Much work has been carried out to address static resiliency, little for decremental resiliency and, to the best of our knowledge, for dynamic resiliency no exact approach that returns a dynamic execution plan if and only if a workflow is resilient has been provided so far. In this paper, we tackle workflow resiliency via extended game automata. We provide three encodings (having polynomial-time complexity) from workflows to extended game automata to model each kind of resiliency as an instantaneous game and we use Uppaal-TIGA to synthesize a winning strategy (i.e., a controller) for such a game. If a controller exists, then the workflow is resilient (as the controller’s strategy corresponds to a dynamic plan). If it doesn’t, then the workflow is breakable. The approach that we propose is correct because it corresponds to a reachability problem for extended game automata (TCTL model checking). Moreover, we have developed Erre, the first tool for workflow resiliency that relies on a controller synthesis approach for the three kinds of resiliency. Thanks to Erre, our approach is thus also fully-automated from analysis to simulation.
papers.abstract_zh: 工作流可满足性问题是寻找用户对任务的分配(即，计划)以便满足所有授权约束的问题。工作流弹性问题是一个应对用户缺席的动态工作流可满足性问题。如果一个工作流是有弹性的，它当然是令人满意的，但反之则不成立。有三个级别的弹性:在静态弹性中，在执行开始之前可能会有多达k个用户不在，并且永远无法用于该执行；在递减弹性中，多达k个用户可能在执行前或执行期间缺席，同样，他们永远无法参与该执行；在动态弹性中，在执行任何任务之前，多达k个用户可能不在，并且在执行之前或执行期间，他们通常可能连续不在并且可用。已经进行了许多工作来解决静态弹性，很少用于递减弹性，并且就我们所知，对于动态弹性，到目前为止还没有提供当且仅当工作流是弹性的时返回动态执行计划的确切方法。在本文中，我们通过扩展的博弈自动机来解决工作流弹性问题。我们提供了从工作流到扩展游戏自动机的三种编码(具有多项式时间复杂度),以将每种弹性建模为即时游戏，并且我们使用乌帕尔-TIGA来为这样的游戏合成获胜策略(即控制器)。如果控制器存在，那么工作流是弹性的(因为控制器的策略对应于动态计划)。如果没有，那么工作流就是不稳定的。我们提出的方法是正确的，因为它对应于扩展博弈自动机(TCTL模型检测)的可达性问题。此外，我们还开发了Erre，这是第一个针对工作流弹性的工具，它依赖于针对三种弹性的控制器合成方法。多亏了Erre，我们的方法从分析到模拟都是全自动的。
papers.title_zh: 最后一个站立的人:通过控制器合成的静态、递减和动态弹性

papers.title: Collusion attacks and fair time-locked deposits for fast-payment transactions in Bitcoin
papers.authors: Xingjie Yu, Michael Thang Shiwen, Yingjiu Li, Robert Huijie Deng
papers.abstract: In Bitcoin network, the distributed storage of multiple copies of the block chain opens up possibilities for doublespending, i.e., a payer issues two separate transactions to two different payees transferring the same coins. While Bitcoin has inherent security mechanism to prevent double-spending attacks, it requires a certain amount of time to detect the doublespending attacks after the transaction has been initiated. Therefore, it is impractical to protect the payees from suffering in double-spending attacks in fast payment scenarios where the time between the exchange of currency and goods or services is shorten to few seconds. Although we cannot prevent double-spending attacks immediately for fast payments, decentralized non-equivocation contracts have been proposed to penalize the malicious payer after the attacks have been detected. The basic idea of these contracts is that the payer locks some coins in a deposit when he initiates a transaction with the payee. If the payer double-spends, a cryptographic primitive called accountable assertions can be used to reveal his Bitcoin credentials for the deposit. Thus, the malicious payer could be penalized by the loss of deposit coins. However, such decentralized nonequivocation contracts are subjected to collusion attacks where the payer colludes with the beneficiary of the depoist and transfers the Bitcoin deposit back to himself when he double-spends, resulting in no penalties. On the other hand, even if the beneficiary behaves honestly, the victim payee cannot get any compensation directly from the deposit in the original design. To prevent such collusion attacks, we design fair time-locked deposits for Bitcoin transactions to defend against doublespending. The fair deposits ensure that the payer will be penalized by the loss of his deposit coins if he double-spends and the victim payee’s loss will be compensated within a locked time period. We start with the protocols of making a deposit for one transaction. In particular, for the transaction with single input and output and the transaction with multiple inputs and outputs, we provide different designs of the deposits. We analyze the performance of deposits made for one transaction and show how the fair deposits work efficiently in Bitcoin. We also provide protocols of making a deposit for multiple transactions, which can reduce the burdens of a honest payer. In the end, we extend the fair deposits to non-equivocation contracts for other distributed systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 在比特币网络中，区块链的多个副本的分布式存储为双重消费提供了可能性，即一个付款人向两个不同的收款人发出两次单独的交易，转移相同的硬币。虽然比特币具有防止重复消费攻击的内在安全机制，但在交易启动后，它需要一定的时间来检测重复消费攻击。因此，在货币和商品或服务交换之间的时间缩短到几秒钟的快速支付场景中，保护收款人免受双重消费攻击是不切实际的。虽然我们不能立即防止对快速支付的双重花费攻击，但是已经提出了分散的不含糊合同，以便在检测到攻击之后惩罚恶意支付者。这些合同的基本思想是，当付款人与收款人开始交易时，他会在存款中锁定一些硬币。如果付款人重复消费，可以使用一种称为可问责断言的加密原语来揭示他的比特币存款凭证。因此，恶意付款人可能会受到损失存款硬币的处罚。然而，这种去中心化的非等价合同会受到共谋攻击，其中付款人与存款人的受益人勾结，在他双重消费时将比特币存款转移回自己，导致没有惩罚。另一方面，即使受益人行为诚实，受害收款人也无法直接从原设计的存款中获得任何赔偿。为了防止这种共谋攻击，我们为比特币交易设计了公平的时间锁定存款，以防止重复消费。公平存款确保如果付款人重复消费，付款人将受到损失其存款硬币的惩罚，而受害收款人的损失将在锁定的时间段内得到补偿。我们从为一笔交易进行存款的协议开始。特别地，对于单输入单输出的交易和多输入多输出的交易，我们提供了不同的存款设计。我们分析了一笔交易的存款表现，并展示了公平存款如何在比特币中有效工作。我们还为多次交易提供存款协议，这可以减轻诚实付款人的负担。最后，我们将公平存款扩展到其他分布式系统的非模糊契约。
papers.title_zh: 比特币快速支付交易中的共谋攻击和公平时间锁定存款

papers.title: PILOT: Password and PIN information leakage from obfuscated typing videos
papers.authors: Kiran S. Balagani, Matteo Cardaioli, Mauro Conti, Paolo Gasti, Martin Georgiev, Tristan Gurtler, Daniele Lain, Charissa Miller, Kendall Molas, Nikita Samarin, Eugen Saraci, Gene Tsudik, Lynn Wu
papers.abstract: This paper studies leakage of user passwords and PINs based on observations of typing feedback on screens or from projectors in the form of masked characters that indicate keystrokes. To this end, we developed an attack called Password and Pin Information Leakage from Obfuscated Typing Videos (PILOT). Our attack extracts inter-keystroke timing information from videos of password masking characters displayed when users type their password on a computer, or their PIN at an ATM. We conducted several experiments in various attack scenarios. Results indicate that, while in some cases leakage is minor, it is quite substantial in others. By leveraging inter-keystroke timings, PILOT recovers 8-character alphanumeric passwords in as little as 19 attempts. When guessing PINs, PILOT significantly improved on both random guessing and the attack strategy adopted in our prior work [4]. In particular, we were able to guess about 3% of the PINs within 10 attempts. This corresponds to a 26-fold improvement compared to random guessing. Our results strongly indicate that secure password masking GUIs must consider the information leakage identified in this paper.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文基于对屏幕上或投影仪上以屏蔽字符形式显示击键的输入反馈的观察，研究了用户密码和pin的泄露。为此，我们从混淆的打字视频(PILOT)中开发了一种叫做密码和Pin信息泄露的攻击。我们的攻击从用户在计算机上输入密码或在ATM机上输入PIN时显示的密码屏蔽字符视频中提取击键间计时信息。我们在不同的攻击场景中进行了几次实验。结果表明，虽然在某些情况下渗漏很少，但在其他情况下渗漏相当严重。通过利用内部击键计时，PILOT只需19次尝试即可恢复8个字符的字母数字密码。在猜测pin时，PILOT在随机猜测和我们之前工作中采用的攻击策略方面都有显著改进[4]。特别是，我们能够在10次尝试中猜出大约3%的pin。与随机猜测相比，这相当于提高了26倍。我们的结果强烈表明，安全的密码屏蔽图形用户界面必须考虑本文中确定的信息泄漏。
papers.title_zh: 试点:密码和个人识别码信息泄漏从模糊打字视频

papers.title: Mitigating the insider threat of remote administrators in clouds through maintenance task assignments
papers.authors: Nawaf Alhebaishi, Lingyu Wang, Sushil Jajodia, Anoop Singhal

papers.title: Deploying ABAC policies using RBAC systems
papers.authors: Gunjan Batra, Vijayalakshmi Atluri, Jaideep Vaidya, Shamik Sural
papers.abstract: The flexibility, portability and identity-less access control features of Attribute Based Access Control(ABAC) make it an attractive choice to be employed in many application domains. However, commercially viable methods for implementation of ABAC do not exist while a vast majority of organizations use Role Based Access Control (RBAC) or their temporal extensions, such as Temporal Role Based Access Control (TRBAC). In this paper, we present a solution for organizations having a RBAC/TRBAC that can deploy an ABAC policy. Essentially, we propose a method for the translation of an ABAC policy (including time constraints) into a form that can be adopted by an RBAC/TRBAC system. We experimentally demonstrate that time taken to evaluate an access request in RBAC and TRBAC systems is significantly less than that of the corresponding ABAC system. Since the cost of security management is more expensive under RBAC when compared to ABAC, we present an analysis of the different management costs and present mitigation approaches by considering various administrative operations.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)的灵活性、可移植性和无身份访问控制特性使其成为许多应用领域的一个有吸引力的选择。然而，商业上可行的实现ABAC的方法并不存在，而绝大多数组织使用基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)或其时间扩展，如基于时间角色的访问控制(TRBAC)。在本文中，我们为拥有可以部署ABAC策略的RBAC/TRBAC的组织提供了一个解决方案。本质上，我们提出了一种将ABAC策略(包括时间约束)转换成可以被RBAC/TRBAC系统采用的形式的方法。我们通过实验证明，在RBAC和TRBAC系统中评估一个访问请求所花费的时间明显少于相应的ABAC系统。由于与ABAC相比，RBAC的安全管理成本更高，我们对不同的管理成本进行了分析，并通过考虑各种管理操作提出了缓解方法。
papers.title_zh: 使用RBAC系统部署ABAC策略

papers.title: Tracking APTs in industrial ecosystems: A proof of concept
papers.authors: Juan E. Rubio, Rodrigo Roman, Cristina Alcaraz, Yan Zhang
papers.abstract: In recent years, Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs) have become a major issue for critical infrastructures that are increasingly integrating modern IT technologies. This requires the development of advanced cyber-security services that can holistically detect and trace these attacks, beyond traditional solutions. In this sense, Opinion Dynamics has been proven as an effective solution, as they can locate the most affected areas within the industrial network. With this information, it is possible to put in place accurate response techniques to limit the impact of attacks on the infrastructure. In this paper, we analyze the applicability of Opinion Dynamics to trace an APT throughout its entire life cycle, by correlating different anomalies over time and accounting for the persistence of threats and the criticality of resources. Moreover, we run various experiments with this novel technique over a testbed that models a real control system, thereby assessing its effectiveness in an actual industrial scenario.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，高级持续威胁(APTs)已经成为日益集成现代IT技术的关键基础架构的一个主要问题。这需要开发先进的网络安全服务，超越传统解决方案，全面检测和跟踪这些攻击。从这个意义上来说，意见动态已被证明是一种有效的解决方案，因为它们可以定位工业网络中受影响最大的区域。有了这些信息，就有可能采取准确的响应技术来限制攻击对基础设施的影响。在本文中，我们分析了意见动态的适用性，通过关联不同异常随时间的变化，并考虑威胁的持久性和资源的关键性，来跟踪APT的整个生命周期。此外，我们在一个模拟真实控制系统的测试床上用这种新技术进行了各种实验，从而评估了它在实际工业场景中的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 跟踪工业生态系统中的apt:概念验证

papers.title: Towards the optimal performance of integrating Warm and Delay against remote cache timing side channels on block ciphers
papers.authors: Ziqiang Ma, Quanwei Cai, Jingqiang Lin, Bo Luo, Jiwu Jing
papers.abstract: Cache timing side channels allow a remote attacker to disclose the cryptographic keys, by repeatedly invoking the encryption/decryption functions and measuring the execution time. WARM and DELAY are two algorithm-independent and implementation-transparent countermeasures against remote cache-based timing side channels for block ciphers. They destroy the relationship between the execution time and the cache misses/hits which are determined by the secret key, but bring remarkable performance overhead. In this paper, we investigate the performance of cryptographic functions protected by WARM and DELAY, and attempt to find the best strategy to integrate these two countermeasures with the optimal performance while effectively eliminate remote cache timing side channels for block ciphers implementations with lookup tables. To the best of our knowledge, this work is the first to systematically analyze the performance of integrating WARM and DELAY against cache side channels.We derive the optimal scheme to integrate WARM and DELAY, and apply it to AES. It is proven that the integration scheme achieves the optimal performance with the least extra operations on commodity systems. Finally, we implement it on Linux with Intel CPUs. Experimental results confirm that, (a) the execution time does not leak information on cache access, (b) the scheme outperforms other integration strategies of WARM and DELAY, and (c) the implementation works without any privileged operations on the computer.
papers.abstract_zh: 缓存计时端通道允许远程攻击者通过重复调用加密/解密函数并测量执行时间来泄露密钥。WARM和DELAY是针对分组密码中基于远程缓存的定时边信道的两种算法独立且实现透明的对策。它们破坏了由密钥决定的执行时间和高速缓存未命中/命中之间的关系，但是带来了显著的性能开销。在本文中，我们研究了由WARM和DELAY保护的密码功能的性能，并试图找到最佳策略来集成这两种对策，以获得最佳性能，同时有效地消除具有查找表的分组密码实现的远程缓存定时边信道。据我们所知，这项工作是第一次系统地分析了针对缓存端通道集成热延迟的性能。我们推导出综合热延迟的最优方案，并将其应用于AES。事实证明，该集成方案在商用系统上以最少的额外操作实现了最佳性能。最后，我们用Intel CPUs在Linux上实现了它。实验结果证实，(a)执行时间不会泄漏关于高速缓存访问的信息，(b)该方案优于其他热集成策略和延迟，以及(c)该实现在计算机上没有任何特权操作的情况下工作。
papers.title_zh: 针对分组密码远程缓存计时侧信道的综合热延迟优化性能

papers.title: Decoupling coding habits from functionality for effective binary authorship attribution
papers.authors: Saed Alrabaee, Paria Shirani, Lingyu Wang, Mourad Debbabi, Aiman Hanna
papers.abstract: Binary authorship attribution refers to the process of identifying the author of a given anonymous binary file based on stylistic characteristics. It aims to automate the laborious and error-prone reverse engineering task of discovering information related to the author(s) of a binary code. Existing works typically employ machine learning methods to extract features that are unique for each author and subsequently match them against a given binary to identify the author. However, most existing works share a common critical limitation, i.e., they cannot distinguish between features representing program functionality and those representing authorship (e.g., authors’ coding habits). Such distinction is crucial for effective authorship attribution because what is unique in a particular binary may be attributed to either author, compiler, or function. In this study, we present BINAUTHOR a system capable of decoupling program functionality from authors’ coding habits in binary code. To capture coding habits, BINAUTHOR leverages a set of features that are based on collections of functionality-independent choices made by authors during coding. Our evaluation demonstrates that BINAUTHOR outperforms existing methods in several aspects. First, it successfully attributes a larger number of authors with a significantly higher accuracy (around 90%) based on the large datasets extracted from selected open-source C++ projects in GitHub, Google Code Jam events, Planet Source Code contests, and several programming projects. Second, BINAUTHOR is more robust than previous methods; there is no significant drop in accuracy when the code is subjected to refactoring techniques, simple obfuscation, and processed with different compilers. Finally, decoupling authorship from functionality allows us to apply BINAUTHOR to real malware binaries (Citadel, Zeus, Stuxnet, Flame, Bunny, and Babar) to automatically generate evidence on similar coding habits.
papers.abstract_zh: 二进制作者归属是指根据文体特征识别给定匿名二进制文件作者的过程。它旨在自动执行费力且容易出错的逆向工程任务，即发现与二进制代码作者相关的信息。现有的作品通常采用机器学习方法来提取每个作者的独特特征，然后将它们与给定的二进制文件进行匹配，以识别作者。然而，大多数现有作品都有一个共同的关键限制，即它们不能区分代表程序功能的特征和代表作者身份的特征(例如，作者的编码习惯)。这种区分对于有效的作者身份归属是至关重要的，因为在特定的二进制文件中唯一的内容可能属于作者、编译器或函数。在这项研究中，我们提出了BINAUTHOR系统，该系统能够将程序功能与作者的二进制代码编码习惯相分离。为了捕捉编码习惯，BINAUTHOR利用了一组特性，这些特性基于作者在编码过程中做出的与功能无关的选择的集合。我们的评估表明，BINAUTHOR在几个方面优于现有的方法。首先，它基于从GitHub中选定的开源C++项目、Google Code Jam events、Planet源代码竞赛和几个编程项目中提取的大数据集，成功地以显著更高的准确度(约90%)归属了大量作者。第二，BINAUTHOR比以前的方法更健壮；当代码经过重构技术、简单的模糊处理，并用不同的编译器处理时，准确性没有显著下降。最后，将作者身份与功能分离允许我们将BINAUTHOR应用于真实的恶意软件二进制文件(Citadel、Zeus、Stuxnet、Flame、Bunny和Babar ),以自动生成类似编码习惯的证据。
papers.title_zh: 将编码习惯与功能分离，以实现有效的二进制作者归属

papers.title: A multi-server oblivious dynamic searchable encryption framework
papers.authors: Thang Hoang, Attila A. Yavuz, F. Betül Durak, Jorge Guajardo
papers.abstract: Data privacy is one of the main concerns for data outsourcing on the cloud. Although standard encryption can provide confidentiality, it also prevents the clients from searching/retrieving meaningful information on the outsourced data thereby, degrading the benefits of using cloud services. To address this data utilization vs. privacy dilemma, Dynamic Searchable Symmetric Encryption (DSSE) has been proposed, which enables encrypted search and update functionality over the encrypted data via a secure index. Despite a lot of efforts, state-of-the-art DSSE constructions still leak significant information from the access pattern, making them vulnerable against various practical attacks. While generic Oblivious Random Access Machine (ORAM) can hide the access pattern, it incurs a logarithmic communication overhead, which was shown costly to be directly used in the DSSE setting. In this article, by exploiting the multi-cloud infrastructure, we develop a comprehensive Oblivious Distributed DSSE (ODSE) framework that allows oblivious search and updates on the encrypted index with high security and improved efficiency over the use of generic ORAM. Our framework contains a series of ODSE schemes each featuring different levels of performance and security required by various types of real-life applications. ODSE offers desirable security guarantees such as informationtheoretic security and robustness in the presence of a malicious adversary. We fully implemented ODSE framework and evaluated its performance in a real cloud environment (Amazon EC2). Our experiments showed that ODSE schemes are 3×-57× faster than using generic ORAMs on a DSSE encrypted index under real network settings.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据隐私是云数据外包的主要关注点之一。虽然标准加密可以提供机密性，但它也阻止了客户搜索/检索关于外包数据的有意义的信息，从而降低了使用云服务的好处。为了解决这种数据利用与隐私的两难问题，已经提出了动态可搜索对称加密(DSSE ),它能够通过安全索引对加密数据进行加密搜索和更新功能。尽管做了很多努力，最先进的DSSE结构仍然会从访问模式中泄漏大量信息，使它们容易受到各种实际攻击。虽然一般的不经意随机存取机(ORAM)可以隐藏存取模式，但它会导致对数通信开销，这表明直接用于DSSE设置是昂贵的。在本文中，通过利用多云基础设施，我们开发了一个全面的不经意分布式DSSE (ODSE)框架，该框架允许对加密索引进行不经意搜索和更新，具有高安全性，并且比使用通用ORAM提高了效率。我们的框架包含一系列ODSE方案，每个方案都具有不同类型的实际应用所需的不同级别的性能和安全性。ODSE提供了理想的安全保证，例如在恶意对手面前的信息论安全性和健壮性。我们完全实现了ODSE框架，并在真实的云环境(Amazon EC2)中评估了它的性能。我们的实验表明，在真实网络设置下，ODSE方案比在DSSE加密索引上使用一般ORAMs快3×-57倍。
papers.title_zh: 多服务器不经意动态可搜索加密框架

papers.authors: Ping Yang, Mikhail I. Gofman, Scott D. Stoller, Zijiang Yang
papers.title_zh: 无需单独管理的基于管理角色的访问控制策略分析

papers.title: The generalized temporal role mining problem
papers.authors: Barsha Mitra, Shamik Sural, Vijayalakshmi Atluri, Jaideep Vaidya
papers.abstract: Role mining, the process of deriving a set of roles from the available user-permission assignments, is considered to be an essential step in successful implementation of Role-Based Access Control RBAC systems. Traditional role mining techniques, however, are not equipped to handle temporal extensions of RBAC like the Temporal-RBAC TRBAC model. In this paper, we formally define the problem of finding a minimal set of roles from temporal user-permission assignments, such that in the resulting TRBAC system, users acquire either the same or a subset of the permissions originally assigned to them for the complete or partial durations of time as specified in the input. We show that the problem is NP-complete and propose a greedy algorithm for solving it. Our algorithm first derives a set of candidate roles from the temporal user-permission assignments and then selects the least possible number of roles from the candidate role set. The final output consists of a set of roles, a user-to-role assignment relation, a role-to-permission assignment relation and a role enabling base describing the time durations for which each role is enabled. Performance of the proposed approach has been evaluated on a number of synthetic as well as real-world datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 角色挖掘是从可用的用户权限分配中获取一组角色的过程，被认为是成功实现基于角色的访问控制RBAC系统的关键步骤。然而，传统的角色挖掘技术不能像时态RBAC TRBAC模型那样处理RBAC的时态扩展。在本文中，我们正式定义了从临时用户权限分配中寻找最小角色集的问题，使得在最终的TRBAC系统中，用户在输入中指定的全部或部分持续时间内获得与最初分配给他们的权限相同的权限或其子集。我们证明了该问题是NP完全的，并提出了一个贪婪算法来解决它。我们的算法首先从临时用户权限分配中获得一组候选角色，然后从候选角色集中选择尽可能少的角色。最终输出包括一组角色、用户到角色的分配关系、角色到权限的分配关系以及描述每个角色被启用的持续时间的角色启用基础。所提出的方法的性能已经在许多合成以及真实世界数据集上进行了评估。
papers.title_zh: 广义时态角色挖掘问题

papers.title: Loose associations to increase utility in data publishing
papers.authors: Sabrina De Capitani di Vimercati, Sara Foresti, Sushil Jajodia, Giovanni Livraga, Stefano Paraboschi, Pierangela Samarati
papers.abstract: Data fragmentation has been proposed as a solution for protecting the confidentiality of sensitive associations when releasing data for publishing or external storage. To enrich the utility of data fragments, a recent approach has put forward the idea of complementing a pair of fragments with some non-precise, hence loose information on the association between them. Starting from the observation that in presence of multiple fragments the publication of several independent associations between pairs of fragments can cause improper leakage of sensitive information, in this paper we extend loose associations to operate over an arbitrary number of fragments.We first illustrate how the publication of multiple loose associations between different pairs of fragments can potentially expose sensitive associations, and describe an approach for defining loose associations among an arbitrary set of fragments. We investigate how tuples in fragments can be grouped for producing loose associations so to increase the utility of queries executed over fragments. We then provide a heuristics for performing such a grouping and producing loose associations satisfying a given level of protection for sensitive associations, while achieving utility for queries over different fragments. We also illustrate the result of an extensive experimental effort over both synthetic and real datasets, which shows the efficiency and the enhanced utility provided by our proposal.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据分段已经被提出作为一种解决方案，用于在释放数据以供发布或外部存储时保护敏感关联的机密性。为了丰富数据片段的效用，最近的一种方法提出了用一些不精确的、因此是松散的关于它们之间的关联的信息来补充一对片段的想法。从观察到在存在多个片段的情况下，片段对之间的几个独立关联的发布会导致敏感信息的不当泄漏开始，在本文中，我们扩展了松散关联以在任意数量的片段上操作。我们首先说明了不同片段对之间的多个松散关联的发布如何可能暴露敏感的关联，并描述了一种在任意片段集合中定义松散关联的方法。我们研究如何对片段中的元组进行分组以产生松散的关联，从而提高对片段执行的查询的效用。然后，我们提供一种试探法，用于执行这样的分组并产生满足敏感关联的给定保护级别的松散关联，同时实现对不同片段的查询的效用。我们还展示了在合成和真实数据集上进行的大量实验工作的结果，这显示了我们的建议所提供的效率和增强的效用。
papers.title_zh: 松散的关联增加了数据发布的效用

papers.title: Anonymizing transactional datasets
papers.authors: Bechara al Bouna, Chris Clifton, Qutaibah M. Malluhi
papers.abstract: In this paper, we study the privacy breach caused by unsafe correlations in transactional data where individuals have multiple tuples in a dataset. We provide two safety constraints to guarantee safe correlation of the data: 1 the safe grouping constraint to ensure that quasi-identifier and sensitive partitions are bounded by l-diversity and 2 the schema decomposition constraint to eliminate non-arbitrary correlations between non-sensitive and sensitive values to protect privacy and at the same time increase the aggregate analysis. In our technique, values are grouped together in unique partitions that enforce l-diversity at the level of individuals. We also propose an association preserving technique to increase the ability to learn/analyze from the anonymized data. To evaluate our approach, we conduct a set of experiments to determine the privacy breach and investigate the anonymization cost of safe grouping and preserving associations.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究了由交易数据中的不安全关联引起的隐私泄露，其中个体在数据集中具有多个元组。我们提供了两个安全约束来保证数据的安全关联:1安全分组约束来确保准标识符和敏感分区受l-多样性约束，以及2模式分解约束来消除非敏感值和敏感值之间的非任意关联以保护隐私，同时增加聚集分析。在我们的技术中，值在独特的分区中被分组在一起，这在个体的水平上加强了l多样性。我们还提出了一种关联保持技术，以提高从匿名数据中学习/分析的能力。为了评估我们的方法，我们进行了一系列实验来确定隐私泄露，并调查安全分组和保留关联的匿名化成本。
papers.title_zh: 匿名化交易数据集

papers.title: Towards user-oriented RBAC model
papers.authors: Haibing Lu, Yuan Hong, Yanjiang Yang, Lian Duan, Nazia Badar
papers.abstract: Role mining is to define a role set to implement the role-based access control RBAC system and regarded as one of the most important and costliest implementation phases. While various role mining models have been proposed, we find that user experience/perception --one ultimate goal for any information system --is surprisingly ignored by the existing works. One advantage of RBAC is to support multiple role assignments and allow a user to activate the necessary role to perform the tasks at each session. However, frequent role activating and deactivating can be a tendinous thing from the user perspective. A user-friendly RBAC system is expected to assign few roles to every user. So in this paper we propose to incorporate to the role mining process a user-role assignment constraint that mandates the maximum number of roles each user can have. Under this rationale, we formulate user-oriented role mining as the user role mining problem, where all users have the same maximal role assignments, the personalized role mining problem, where users can have different maximal role assignments, and the approximate versions of the two problems, which tolerate a certain amount of deviation from the complete reconstruction. The extra constraint on the maximal role assignments poses a great challenge to role mining, which in general is already a hard problem. We examine some typical existing role mining methods to see their applicability to our problems. In light of their insufficiency, we present a new algorithm, which is based on a novel dynamic candidate role generation strategy, tailored to our problems. Experiments on benchmark data sets demonstrate the effectiveness of our proposed algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: 角色挖掘是定义一个角色集来实现基于角色的访问控制RBAC系统，被认为是最重要和最昂贵的实现阶段之一。虽然已经提出了各种角色挖掘模型，但我们发现用户体验/感知——任何信息系统的最终目标——令人惊讶地被现有的工作所忽略。RBAC的一个优点是支持多个角色分配，并允许用户在每个会话中激活必要的角色来执行任务。然而，从用户的角度来看，频繁的角色激活和停用可能是一件棘手的事情。一个用户友好的RBAC系统应该给每个用户分配很少的角色。因此，在本文中，我们建议在角色挖掘过程中加入一个用户-角色分配约束，该约束规定了每个用户可以拥有的角色的最大数量。在这种基本原理下，我们将面向用户的角色挖掘公式化为用户角色挖掘问题，其中所有用户具有相同的最大角色分配，个性化角色挖掘问题，其中用户可以具有不同的最大角色分配，以及这两个问题的近似版本，其容许与完全重构的一定量的偏差。对最大角色分配的额外限制对角色挖掘提出了巨大的挑战，这通常已经是一个难题。我们检查一些典型的现有角色挖掘方法，看看它们对我们的问题的适用性。针对它们的不足，我们提出了一种新的算法，它基于一种新颖的动态候选角色生成策略，适合我们的问题。在基准数据集上的实验验证了该算法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 走向面向用户的RBAC模式

papers.title: k-jump: A strategy to design publicly-known algorithms for privacy preserving micro-data disclosure
papers.authors: Wen Ming Liu, Lingyu Wang, Lei Zhang, Shunzhi Zhu
papers.abstract: Data owners are expected to disclose micro-data for research, analysis, and various other purposes. In disclosing micro-data with sensitive attributes, the goal is usually two fold. First, the data utility of disclosed data should be maximized for analysis purposes. Second, the private information contained in such data must be to an acceptable level. Typically, a disclosure algorithm evaluates potential generalization functions in a predetermined order, and then discloses the first generalization that satisfies the desired privacy property. Recent studies show that adversarial inferences using knowledge about such disclosure algorithms can usually render the algorithm unsafe. In this paper, we show that an existing unsafe algorithm can be transformed into a large family of safe algorithms, namely, k-jump algorithms. We then prove that the data utility of different k-jump algorithms is generally incomparable. The comparison of data utility is independent of utility measures and syntactic privacy models. Finally, we analyze the computational complexity of k-jump algorithms, and confirm the necessity of safe algorithms even when a secret choice is made among algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据所有者应该为研究、分析和各种其他目的披露微观数据。在披露具有敏感属性的微观数据时，目标通常是双重的。首先，出于分析目的，披露数据的数据效用应最大化。其次，此类数据中包含的私人信息必须达到可接受的水平。典型地，公开算法以预定的顺序评估潜在的一般化函数，然后公开满足期望的隐私属性的第一个一般化。最近的研究表明，使用关于这种公开算法的知识的对抗性推理通常会使算法不安全。在本文中，我们证明了一个现有的不安全算法可以转化为一个大家族的安全算法，即k-jump算法。然后我们证明不同k跳算法的数据效用一般是不可比的。数据效用的比较独立于效用度量和语法隐私模型。最后，我们分析了k-jump算法的计算复杂性，并证实了即使在算法之间进行秘密选择时，安全算法的必要性。
papers.title_zh: k-jump:一种设计保护隐私的微数据公开算法的策略

papers.title: Accountable wiretapping - or - I know they can hear you now
papers.authors: Adam Bates, Kevin R. B. Butler, Micah Sherr, Clay Shields, Patrick Traynor, Dan S. Wallach
papers.abstract: In many democratic countries, CALEA1 wiretaps are used by law enforcement agencies to perform investigations and gather evidence for legal procedures. However, existing CALEA wiretap implementations are often engineered with the assumption that wiretap operators are trustworthy and wiretap targets do not attempt to evade the wiretap. Although it may be possible to construct more robust wiretap architectures by reengineering significant portions of the telecommunications infrastructure, such efforts are prohibitively costly. This paper instead proposes a lightweight accountable wiretapping system for enabling secure audits of existing CALEA wiretapping systems. Our proposed system maintains a tamper-evident encrypted log over wiretap events, enforces access controls over wiretap records, and enables privacy-preserving aggregate queries and compliance checks. We demonstrate using campus-wide telephone trace data from a large university that our approach provides efficient auditing functionalities while incurring only modest overhead. Based on publicly available wiretap reporting statistics, we conservatively estimate that our architecture can support tamper-evident logging for all of the United States’ ongoing CALEA wiretaps using three commodity PCs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在许多民主国家，执法机构使用电子窃听装置进行调查，为法律程序收集证据。然而，现有的CALEA窃听实现通常是基于这样的假设设计的，即窃听操作者是值得信任的，并且窃听目标不会试图逃避窃听。虽然有可能通过重新设计电信基础设施的重要部分来构建更健壮的窃听架构，但是这种努力的成本高得惊人。相反，本文提出了一个轻量级的负责任的窃听系统，用于对现有的CALEA窃听系统进行安全审计。我们提出的系统维护了一个针对窃听事件的篡改明显的加密日志，对窃听记录实施访问控制，并支持隐私保护的聚合查询和合规性检查。我们使用来自一所大型大学的校园电话追踪数据证明了我们的方法提供了高效的审计功能，同时只产生了适度的开销。根据公开可用的窃听报告统计数据，我们保守地估计，我们的架构可以使用三台商用电脑支持美国所有正在进行的CALEA窃听的防篡改记录。
papers.title_zh: 负责任的窃听-或者-我知道他们现在能听到你

papers.title: What, indeed, is intransitive noninterference?
papers.authors: Ron van der Meyden
papers.abstract: This paper argues that Haigh and Young's definition of noninterference for intransitive security policies admits information flows that are not in accordance with the intuitions it seeks to formalise. Several alternative definitions are discussed, which are shown to be equivalent to the classical definition of noninterference with respect to transitive policies. Rushby's unwinding conditions for intransitive noninterference are shown to be sound and complete for one of these definitions, TA-security. Access control systems compatible with a policy are shown to be TA-secure, and it is also shown that TA-security implies that the system can be interpreted as an access control system.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文认为，Haigh和Young对非传递性安全策略的不干涉定义承认信息流不符合它试图形式化的直觉。讨论了几个可选择的定义，它们被证明与关于传递策略的不干涉的经典定义是等价的。Rushby关于不及物不干涉的展开条件对于其中一个定义TA-security来说是合理和完整的。与策略兼容的访问控制系统被示出是TA安全的，并且还示出TA安全意味着该系统可以被解释为访问控制系统。
papers.title_zh: 什么是不及物不干涉？

papers.title: Practical and provably secure distance-bounding
papers.authors: Ioana Boureanu, Aikaterini Mitrokotsa, Serge Vaudenay
papers.abstract: From contactless payments to remote car unlocking, many applications are vulnerable to relay attacks. Distance bounding protocols are the main practical countermeasure against these attacks. At FSEi¾ź2013, we presented SKI as the first family of provably secure distance bounding protocols. At LIGHTSECi¾ź2013, we presented the best attacks against SKI. In this paper, we present the security proofs. More precisely, we explicate a general formalism for distance-bounding protocols. Then, we prove that SKI and its variants is provably secure, even under the real-life setting of noisy communications, against the main types of relay attacks: distance-fraud and generalised versions of mafia- and terrorist-fraud. For this, we reinforce the idea of using secret sharing, combined with the new notion of a leakage scheme. In view of resistance to mafia-frauds and terrorist-frauds, we present the notion of circular-keying for pseudorandom functions PRFs; this notion models the employment of a PRF, with possible linear reuse of the key. We also use PRF masking to fix common mistakes in existing security proofs/claims.
papers.abstract_zh: 从非接触式支付到远程汽车解锁，许多应用都容易受到中继攻击。距离限制协议是对抗这些攻击的主要实用对策。在FSEi ź2013会议上，我们提出了SKI作为第一个可证明安全的距离限制协议。在ź2013 light SECI，我们展示了针对滑雪的最佳攻击。本文给出了安全性证明。更准确地说，我们阐述了距离限制协议的一般形式。然后，我们证明了SKI和它的变体是可证明安全的，即使在现实生活的嘈杂的通信环境下，对主要类型的中继攻击:远程欺诈和黑手党和恐怖分子欺诈的一般化版本。为此，我们加强了使用秘密共享的想法，并结合了泄漏方案的新概念。考虑到抵抗黑手党欺诈和恐怖分子欺诈，我们提出了伪随机函数PRFs的循环密钥概念；这个概念对PRF的使用进行建模，并可能对密钥进行线性重用。我们还使用PRF屏蔽来修复现有安全证明/声明中的常见错误。
papers.title_zh: 实用且可证明安全的距离限制

papers.title: Verifying layered security protocols
papers.authors: Thomas Gibson-Robinson, Allaa Kamil, Gavin Lowe
papers.abstract: Many security protocols are built as the composition of an application-layer protocol and a secure transport protocol, such as TLS. There are several approaches to proving the correctness of such protocols. One popular approach is verification by abstraction, in which the correctness of the application-layer protocol is proven under the assumption that the transport layer satisfies certain properties, such as confidentiality. Following this approach, we adapt the strand spaces model in order to analyse application-layer protocols that depend on secure transport protocols; we consider both bilaterally and unilaterally authenticating secure transport protocols, such as bilateral and unilateral TLS. The paper's main contribution is a proof of the model's soundness. In particular, we prove that, subject to a suitable indepen- dence assumption, if there is an attack against the application-layer protocol when layered on top of a particular secure transport protocol, then there is an attack against the abstracted model of the application-layer protocol. In contrast to existing work in this area, the independence assumption consists of eight statically checkable conditions, meaning that it is not necessary to consider all possible runs of the protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多安全协议是由应用层协议和安全传输协议(如TLS)组合而成的。有几种方法可以证明此类协议的正确性。一种流行的方法是通过抽象进行验证，在这种方法中，应用层协议的正确性是在传输层满足某些属性(如机密性)的假设下得到证明的。按照这种方法，我们修改了串空间模型，以便分析依赖于安全传输协议的应用层协议；我们考虑双边和单边认证安全传输协议，如双边和单边TLS。论文的主要贡献是证明了模型的可靠性。特别地，我们证明了，在适当的独立性假设下，如果在特定的安全传输协议之上存在对应用层协议的攻击，则存在对应用层协议的抽象模型的攻击。与该领域的现有工作相比，独立性假设由八个静态可检查条件组成，这意味着没有必要考虑协议的所有可能运行。
papers.title_zh: 验证分层安全协议

papers.title: Expected loss analysis for authentication in constrained channels
papers.authors: Christos Dimitrakakis, Aikaterini Mitrokotsa, Serge Vaudenay
papers.abstract: We derive bounds on the expected loss for authentication protocols in channels which are constrained due to noisy conditions and communication costs. This is motivated by a number of authentication protocols, where at least some part of the authentication is performed during a phase, lasting n rounds, with no error correction. This requires assigning an acceptable threshold for the number of detected errors and taking into account the cost of incorrect authentication and of communication. This paper describes a framework enabling an expected loss analysis for all the protocols in this family. Computationally simple methods to obtain nearly optimal values for the threshold, as well as for the number of rounds are suggested and upper bounds on the expected loss, holding uniformly, are given. These bounds are tight, as shown by a matching lower bound. Finally, a method to adaptively select both the number of rounds and the threshold is proposed for a certain class of protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们推导了认证协议在信道中的期望损失的界限，该信道由于噪声条件和通信成本而受到限制。这是由许多认证协议所激发的，其中在持续n轮的阶段期间至少执行认证的某一部分，而没有错误纠正。这需要为检测到的错误数量指定一个可接受的阈值，并考虑不正确身份验证和通信的成本。本文描述了一个框架，能够对该系列中的所有协议进行预期损失分析。计算简单的方法，以获得接近最佳值的阈值，以及轮数建议和上限的预期损失，保持一致。这些界限很紧，如匹配的下限所示。最后，针对某一类协议，提出了一种自适应选择轮数和阈值的方法。
papers.title_zh: 受限信道中认证的期望损失分析

papers.title: Proved generation of implementations from computationally secure protocol specifications
papers.authors: David Cadé, Bruno Blanchet
papers.abstract: In order to obtain implementations of security protocols proved secure in the computational model, we have previously implemented a compiler that takes a specification of the protocol in the input language of the computational protocol verifier CryptoVerif and translates it into an OCaml implementation. However, until now, this compiler was not proved correct, so we did not have real guarantees on the generated implementation. In this paper, we fill this gap. We prove that this compiler preserves the security properties proved by CryptoVerif: if an adversary has probability p of breaking a security property in the generated code, then there exists an adversary that breaks the property with the same probability p in the CryptoVerif specification. Therefore, if the protocol specification is proved secure in the computational model by CryptoVerif, then the generated implementation is also secure.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了获得在计算模型中被证明是安全的安全协议的实现，我们先前实现了一个编译器，该编译器采用计算协议验证器CryptoVerif的输入语言中的协议规范，并将其翻译成OCaml实现。然而，直到现在，这个编译器还没有被证明是正确的，所以我们对生成的实现没有真正的保证。本文填补了这一空白。我们证明了这个编译器保持了CryptoVerif所证明的安全性质:如果一个敌手有概率p破坏生成代码中的一个安全性质，那么存在一个敌手以同样的概率p破坏CryptoVerif规范中的性质。因此，如果CryptoVerif在计算模型中证明协议规范是安全的，那么生成的实现也是安全的。
papers.title_zh: 从计算安全协议规范证明实现的生成

papers.title: PCPOR: Public and constant-cost proofs of retrievability in cloud
papers.authors: Jiawei Yuan, Shucheng Yu
papers.abstract: For data storage outsourcing services, it is important to allow users to efficiently and securely verify that cloud storage servers store their data correctly. To address this issue, a number of Proof of Retrievability (POR) and Proof of Data Possession (PDP) schemes have been proposed wherein servers must prove to a verifier that data are stored correctly. While existing POR and PDP schemes offer decent solutions addressing various practical issues, they either have non-trivial (linear or quadratic) communication and computational complexity, or only consider private verification. In this paper, we propose the first POR scheme with public verifiability, constant communication and computational costs on users. In our scheme, messages exchanged between cloud servers and users are composed of a constant number of group elements and random numbers; computational tasks required on users are also constant; batch auditing of multiple tasks is also efficiently supported. We achieved these by a unique design based on our novel polynomial-based authenticators. Extensive experiments on Amazon EC2 cloud and different client devices (contemporary and mobile devices) show that our design allows a user to audit the integrity of a file of any size with a constant computational cost of 150 ms on PC (2.11 s on mobile device) and a communication cost of 2.34 kB for 99% error detection probability when employing an erasure coding with 1% fault tolerance rate. We prove the security of our scheme based on the Computational Diffie-Hellman problem, the t-Strong Diffie-Hellman problem and the Static Diffie-Hellman problem.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于数据存储外包服务，重要的是允许用户高效、安全地验证云存储服务器正确存储他们的数据。为了解决这个问题，已经提出了许多可检索性证明(POR)和数据拥有证明(PDP)方案，其中服务器必须向验证者证明数据被正确存储。虽然现有的POR和PDP方案提供了解决各种实际问题的体面的解决方案，但是它们或者具有非平凡的(线性或二次)通信和计算复杂性，或者仅考虑私有验证。在本文中，我们提出了第一个具有公开可验证性、恒定通信和用户计算开销的POR方案。在我们的方案中，云服务器和用户之间交换的消息由常数个组元素和随机数组成；用户所需的计算任务也是恒定的；还有效地支持多个任务的批处理审计。我们通过基于我们新颖的基于多项式的认证器的独特设计实现了这些。在Amazon EC2云和不同客户端设备(当代和移动设备)上的大量实验表明，我们的设计允许用户在PC上以150 ms的恒定计算成本(在移动设备上为2.11 s)和2.34 kB的通信成本审计任何大小的文件的完整性，当采用具有1%容错率的擦除编码时，对于99%的错误检测概率。我们基于计算性Diffie-Hellman问题、t-强Diffie-Hellman问题和静态Diffie-Hellman问题证明了方案的安全性。
papers.title_zh: PCPOR:云中可检索性的公共和恒定成本证明

papers.title: On the information leakage of differentially-private mechanisms
papers.authors: Mário S. Alvim, Miguel E. Andrés, Konstantinos Chatzikokolakis, Pierpaolo Degano, Catuscia Palamidessi
papers.abstract:
Differential privacy aims at protecting the privacy of participants in 
statistical databases. Roughly, a mechanism satisfies differential privacy if 
the presence or value of a single individual in the database does not 
significantly change the likelihood of obtaining a certain answer to any 
statistical query posed by a data analyst. Differentially-private mechanisms are 
often oblivious: first the query is processed on the database to produce a true 
answer, and then this answer is adequately randomized before being reported to 
the data analyst. Ideally, a mechanism should minimize leakage, i.e., obfuscate 
as much as possible the link between reported answers and individuals' data, 
while maximizing utility, i.e., report answers as similar as possible to the 
true ones. These two goals, however, are in conflict with each other, thus 
imposing a trade-off between privacy and utility. 
 
In this paper we use quantitative information flow principles to analyze leakage 
and utility in oblivious differentially-private mechanisms. We introduce a 
technique that exploits graph symmetries of the adjacency relation on databases 
to derive bounds on the min-entropy leakage of the mechanism. We consider a 
notion of utility based on identity gain functions, which is closely related to 
min-entropy leakage, and we derive bounds for it. Finally, given some graph 
symmetries, we provide a mechanism that maximizes utility while preserving the 
required level of differential privacy.
papers.abstract_zh:
差别隐私旨在保护参与者的隐私
统计数据库。粗略地说，一种机制满足差分隐私，如果
数据库中单个个体的存在或价值不
极大地改变了获得某个答案的可能性
数据分析师提出的统计查询。差异私有机制是
通常不被注意:首先在数据库上处理查询以产生一个真实的
答案，然后这个答案在被报告之前被充分随机化
数据分析师。理想地，一种机制应该最小化泄漏，即混淆
尽可能将报告的答案和个人数据联系起来，
同时最大化效用，即报告尽可能相似的答案
真实的。然而，这两个目标是相互冲突的，因此
在隐私和实用性之间进行权衡。

在本文中，我们使用定量信息流原理来分析泄漏
以及在不经意差分私有机制中的效用。我们介绍一个
利用数据库中邻接关系的图形对称性的技术
推导出该机制最小熵泄漏的界限。我们认为
效用的概念基于身份增益函数，这与
最小熵泄漏，我们得出了它的界限。最后，给出一些图表
对称性，我们提供了一种机制，最大限度地利用，同时保持
所需的不同隐私级别。
papers.title_zh: 论差别私有机制的信息泄漏

papers.title: Delegated integrity check for hierarchical cloud data
papers.authors: Shiuan-Tzuo Shen, Wen-Guey Tzeng
papers.title_zh: 分层云数据的委托完整性检查

papers.title: CookiExt: Patching the browser against session hijacking attacks
papers.authors: Michele Bugliesi, Stefano Calzavara, Riccardo Focardi, Wilayat Khan
papers.abstract: Session cookies constitute one of the main attack targets against client authentication on the Web. To counter these attacks, modern web browsers implement native cookie protection mechanisms based on the HttpOnly and Secure ags. While there is a general understanding about the eectiveness of these defenses, no formal result has so far been proved about the security guarantees they convey. With the present paper we provide the rst such result, by presenting a mechanized proof of noninterference assessing the robustness of the HttpOnly and Secure cookie ags against both web and network attackers with the ability to perform arbitrary XSS code injection. We then develop CookiExt, a browser extension that provides client-side protection against session hijacking, based on appropriate agging of session cookies and automatic redirection over HTTPS for HTTP requests carrying these cookies. Our solution improves over existing client-side defenses by combining protection against both web and network attacks, while at the same time being designed so as to minimise its eects on the user's browsing experience. Finally, we report on the experiments we carried out to practically evaluate the eectiveness of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 会话cookies是Web上针对客户端身份验证的主要攻击目标之一。为了应对这些攻击，现代web浏览器实现了基于HttpOnly和安全ags的本地cookie保护机制。虽然对这些防御措施的有效性有一个普遍的理解，但是到目前为止还没有正式的结果证明它们所传达的安全保证。在本文中，我们提供了第一个这样的结果，通过提供一个无干扰的机械化证明，评估了HttpOnly和Secure cookie ags对能够执行任意XSS代码注入的web和网络攻击者的鲁棒性。然后，我们开发了CookiExt，这是一个浏览器扩展，它基于会话cookie的适当聚集和通过HTTPS对携带这些cookie的HTTP请求的自动重定向，提供了针对会话劫持的客户端保护。我们的解决方案通过结合针对web和网络攻击的保护，改进了现有的客户端防御，同时设计为最大限度地减少对用户浏览体验的影响。最后，我们报告了我们进行的实验，以实际评估我们的方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: CookiExt:针对会话劫持攻击修补浏览器

papers.title: Special issue on security and high performance computing systems
papers.authors: Luca Spalazzi, Luca Viganò
papers.abstract: Providing high performance computing and security is a challenging task. On the one hand, Internet, operating systems and distributed environments currently suffer from poor security support and cannot resist common attacks. On the other hand, adding security measures typically degrades performance. The relationships between security and high performance computing systems thus raise a number of problems and challenges such as the following ones:
papers.abstract_zh: 提供高性能计算和安全性是一项极具挑战性的任务。一方面，目前互联网、操作系统和分布式环境的安全支持较差，无法抵御常见的攻击。另一方面，增加安全措施通常会降低性能。因此，安全性和高性能计算系统之间的关系引发了许多问题和挑战，如下所述:
papers.title_zh: 安全和高性能计算系统特刊

papers.title: Design and performance analysis of efficient Keccak tree hashing on GPU architectures
papers.authors: Jason Lowden, Marcin Lukowiak, Sonia Lopez-Alarcon
papers.abstract: In an effort to provide security and data integrity, hashing algorithms have been designed to consume an input of any length to produce a fixed length output. KECCAK was selected by NIST to become the next Secure Hashing Algorithm (SHA-3) after nearly five years of competition. In addition to providing a sequential operating mode, there is also a tree mode that allows large input messages to be hashed in parallel. This work focuses on the exploration and analysis of the KECCAK tree hashing mode on a GPU platform. Based on the implementation, there are core features of the GPU that could be used to accelerate the time it takes to complete a hash due to the massively parallel architecture of the device. In addition to analyzing the speed of the algorithm, the underlying hardware is profiled to identify the bottlenecks that limited the hash speed. The results of this work show that tree hashing can hash data at rates of up to 3 GB/s for the fixed size tree mode. On a 3.40 GHz CPU, this is the equivalent of 1.03 cycles per byte, more than six times faster than a sequential implementation for a very large input. For the variable size tree mode, the throughput was 500 MB/s. Based on the performance analysis, modification of the input rate of the KECCAK sponge resulted in a negligible change to the overall speed. As a result of the hardware profiling, the register and L1 cache usage in the GPU was a major bottleneck to the overall throughput.
papers.abstract_zh: 在提供安全性和数据完整性的努力中，散列算法被设计成消耗任何长度的输入来产生固定长度的输出。经过近五年的竞争，KECCAK被NIST选为下一代安全散列算法(SHA-3)。除了提供顺序操作模式之外，还有一种树模式，允许并行散列大型输入消息。本文主要研究在GPU平台上对KECCAK树哈希模式的探索和分析。基于实现，由于设备的大规模并行架构，GPU的核心功能可用于加速完成哈希所需的时间。除了分析算法的速度之外，还对底层硬件进行了分析，以确定限制哈希速度的瓶颈。这项工作的结果表明，对于固定大小的树模式，树散列可以以高达3 GB/s的速率散列数据。在3.40 GHz的CPU上，这相当于每字节1.03个周期，比超大输入的顺序实现快6倍多。对于可变大小树模式，吞吐量为500 MB/s。根据性能分析，修改KECCAK海绵的输入速率对整体速度的影响可以忽略不计。硬件配置的结果是，GPU中的寄存器和L1缓存的使用成为整体吞吐量的主要瓶颈。
papers.title_zh: GPU架构下高效Keccak树哈希算法的设计与性能分析

papers.title: Service security and privacy as a socio-technical problem
papers.authors: Giampaolo Bella, Paul Curzon, Gabriele Lenzini
papers.abstract: The security and privacy of the data that users transmit, more or less deliberately, to modern services is an open problem. It is not solely limited to the actual Internet traversal, a sub-problem vastly tackled by consolidated research in security protocol design and analysis. By contrast, it entails much broader dimensions pertaining to how users approach technology and understand the risks for the data they enter. For example, users may express cautious or distracted personas depending on the service and the point in time; further, pre-established paths of practice may lead them to neglect the intrusive privacy policy offered by a service, or the outdated protections adopted by another. The approach that sees the service security and privacy problem as a socio-technical one needs consolidation. With this motivation, the article makes a threefold contribution. It reviews the existing literature on service security and privacy, especially from the socio-technical standpoint. Further, it outlines a general research methodology aimed at layering the problem appropriately, at suggesting how to position existing findings, and ultimately at indicating where a transdisciplinary task force may fit in. The article concludes with the description of the three challenge domains of services whose security and privacy we deem open socio-technical problems, not only due to their inherent facets but also to their huge number of users.
papers.abstract_zh: 用户有意或无意地向现代服务传输的数据的安全性和隐私性是一个公开的问题。它不仅仅局限于实际的因特网穿越，这是一个在安全协议设计和分析的综合研究中广泛解决的子问题。相比之下，它需要更广泛的维度，涉及用户如何接触技术和理解他们输入的数据的风险。例如，用户可能会根据服务和时间点表达谨慎或分心的人物角色；此外，预先建立的实践路径可能会导致他们忽略一个服务提供的侵入性隐私政策，或者另一个服务采用的过时保护。将服务安全性和隐私问题视为社会技术问题的方法需要整合。基于这一动机，本文做出了三方面的贡献。它回顾了现有的关于服务安全和隐私的文献，特别是从社会技术的角度。此外，它概述了一个一般的研究方法，旨在将问题适当分层，建议如何定位现有的发现，并最终指出一个跨学科的工作队可能适合在哪里。文章最后描述了服务的三个挑战领域，我们认为它们的安全性和隐私是公开的社会技术问题，这不仅是因为它们固有的方面，也是因为它们有大量的用户。
papers.title_zh: 作为社会技术问题的服务安全和隐私

papers.title: Brandt's fully private auction protocol revisited
papers.authors: Jannik Dreier, Jean-Guillaume Dumas, Pascal Lafourcade
papers.abstract: Auctions have a long history, having been recorded as early as 500 B.C. Nowadays, electronic auctions have been a great success and are increasingly used. Many cryptographic protocols have been proposed to address the various security requirements of these electronic transactions, in particular to ensure privacy. Brandt developed a protocol that computes the winner using homomorphic operations on a distributed ElGamal encryption of the bids. He claimed that it ensures full privacy of the bidders, i.e. no information apart from the winner and the winning price is leaked. We first show that this protocol -- when using malleable interactive zero-knowledge proofs -- is vulnerable to attacks by dishonest bidders. Such bidders can manipulate the publicly available data in a way that allows the seller to deduce all participants' bids. Additionally we discuss some issues with verifiability as well as attacks on non-repudiation, fairness and the privacy of individual bidders exploiting authentication problems.
papers.abstract_zh: 拍卖有着悠久的历史，早在公元前500年就有记录。如今，电子拍卖取得了巨大的成功，并越来越多地被使用。已经提出了许多密码协议来解决这些电子交易的各种安全要求，特别是确保隐私。Brandt开发了一个协议，通过对投标的分布式ElGamal加密进行同态运算来计算获胜者。他声称，这确保了投标人的完全隐私，即除了获胜者和获胜价格之外，没有任何信息被泄露。我们首先表明，当使用可延展的交互式零知识证明时，该协议容易受到不诚实投标人的攻击。这种投标人可以操纵公开可用的数据，从而允许卖方推断所有参与者的投标。此外，我们还讨论了一些与可验证性有关的问题，以及利用认证问题对不可否认性、公平性和个人投标人隐私的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 重新审视勃兰特的完全私人拍卖协议

papers.title: Measuring and estimating power consumption in Android to support energy-based intrusion detection
papers.authors: Alessio Merlo, Mauro Migliardi, Paolo Fontanelli
papers.title_zh: 测量和估计Android中的功耗以支持基于能量的入侵检测

papers.title: An analysis of graphs that represent a role-based security policy hierarchy
papers.authors: Sergey V. Belim, Nadezda F. Bogachenko, Evgeniy Ilushechkin
papers.title_zh: 对表示基于角色的安全策略层次结构的图形的分析

papers.title: New access control systems based on outsourced attribute-based encryption
papers.authors: Jin Li, Xiaofeng Chen, Jingwei Li, Chunfu Jia, Jianfeng Ma, Wenjing Lou
papers.abstract: As cloud computing becomes prevalent, more and more sensitive data is being centralized into the cloud for sharing, which brings forth new challenges for outsourced data security and privacy. Attribute-based encryption (ABE) is a promising cryptographic primitive, which has been widely applied to design fine-grained access control system recently. However, ABE is criticized for its high scheme overhead as the computational cost grows with the complexity of the access formula. This disadvantage becomes more serious for mobile devices with constrained computing resources. Aiming at tackling the challenge above, we present a generic and efficient solution to implement attribute-based access control system by introducing secure outsourcing techniques into ABE. More precisely, two cloud service providers (CSPs), namely key generation-cloud service provider (KG-CSP) and decryption-cloud service provider (D-CSP) are introduced to perform the outsourced key-issuing and decryption on behalf of attribute authority and users respectively. In order to outsource heavy computation to both CSPs without private information leakage, we formalize an underlying primitive called outsourced ABE (OABE) and propose several constructions with outsourced decryption and key-issuing. Finally, extensive experiment demonstrates that with the help of KG-CSP and D-CSP, efficient key-issuing and decryption are achieved in our constructions.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云计算的普及，越来越多的敏感数据被集中到云中共享，这给外包数据的安全和隐私带来了新的挑战。基于属性的加密(ABE)是一种很有前途的密码原语，近年来被广泛应用于设计细粒度的访问控制系统。然而，由于计算成本随着访问公式的复杂性而增长，ABE因其高方案开销而受到批评。对于计算资源有限的移动设备来说，这个缺点变得更加严重。针对上述挑战，我们提出了一种通用而有效的解决方案，通过在ABE中引入安全外包技术来实现基于属性的访问控制系统。更准确地说，引入了两个云服务提供商(CSP)，即密钥生成云服务提供商(KG-CSP)和解密云服务提供商(D-CSP)，分别代表属性权威机构和用户执行外包的密钥发布和解密。为了将繁重的计算外包给两个CSP而不泄漏隐私信息，我们形式化了一个称为外包ABE (OABE)的底层原语，并提出了几个外包解密和密钥分发的构造。最后，大量的实验表明，在KG-CSP和D-CSP的帮助下，我们的构造实现了高效的密钥发布和解密。
papers.title_zh: 基于外包属性加密的新型访问控制系统

papers.title: A formal framework for security analysis of NFC mobile coupon protocols
papers.authors: Abdullah Ali Alshehri, Steve A. Schneider
papers.abstract: Near Field Communication (NFC) is a Radio Frequency (RF) technology that allows data to be exchanged between devices that are in close proximity. An NFC-based mobile coupon (M-coupon) is a coupon that is retrieved by the user from a source such as a newspaper or a smart poster and redeemed afterwards. The M-coupon is a cryptographically secured electronic message with some value stored on user’s mobile.We develop a formal framework for security analysis of NFC mobile coupons protocols using formal methods (CasperFDR). The framework aims to check whether NFC M-coupon protocols address their security requirements. The paper starts with a formal definition of the NFC M-coupon requirements in which can be applied to a variety of protocols. Then, we apply the framework to a quadratic residue-based NFC M-coupon protocol proposed in the literature. The analysis shows an attack against User Authentication property. An additional contribution is that we model the protocol with a challenge of modelling the quadratic residue theorem (QR). We propose two ways of abstracting QR in the model with the pros and cons of both methods. We show how to overcome some limitations of CasperFDR, the protocol analysis tool used, that prevent us from modelling the protocol in a natural way. Moreover, we discuss an interesting observation regarding how found attacks can be affected by a divided long message in CasperFDR
papers.abstract_zh: 近场通信(NFC)是一种射频(RF)技术，允许在非常接近的设备之间交换数据。基于NFC的移动优惠券(M-coupon)是一种由用户从诸如报纸或智能海报等来源检索并在之后兑现的优惠券。M-coupon是一种加密的安全电子消息，具有存储在用户手机上的一些值。我们开发了一个使用形式化方法对NFC手机优惠券协议进行安全性分析的形式化框架(CasperFDR)。该框架旨在检查NFC M-coupon协议是否满足其安全要求。本文首先给出了NFC M-coupon要求的正式定义，该定义适用于各种协议。然后，我们将该框架应用于文献中提出的基于二次剩余的NFC M-coupon协议。分析显示了对用户认证属性的攻击。一个额外的贡献是，我们用模拟二次剩余定理(QR)的挑战来模拟协议。我们提出了两种抽象模型中QR的方法，并比较了这两种方法的优缺点。我们展示了如何克服所使用的协议分析工具CasperFDR的一些限制，这些限制阻止我们以自然的方式对协议建模。此外，我们还讨论了一个有趣的观察结果，即CasperFDR中的一个分割的长消息会如何影响found攻击
papers.title_zh: NFC手机优惠券协议安全性分析的形式化框架

papers.title: Event-driven RBAC
papers.authors: Piero A. Bonatti, Clemente Galdi, Davide Torres
papers.abstract: Context-aware access control systems should reactively adapt access control decisions to dynamic environmental conditions. In this paper we present ERBAC - an event-driven extension of the TRBAC model that allows the specification and enforcement of general reactive policies - and its implementation. While almost all the individual features of ERBAC occur separately in some previous model, the detailed design of the policy language, its implementation in XACML, and its testing contribute to the development of expressive, event-driven policy frameworks by demonstrating that this rich model can be satisfactorily implemented, and that its expressivity and performance are compatible with a variety of realistic application scenarios. In particular, a number of examples illustrate ERBAC's expressive power, and its ability of handling exceptional situations in a flexible way, while keeping policies compact and manageable. The prototype extends XACML's language and the implementation of the PDP to support the new model. Systematic scalability experiments show that the computational cost of policy rule evaluation in ERBAC is compatible with real-world applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 上下文感知的访问控制系统应该反应性地使访问控制决策适应动态的环境条件。在本文中，我们介绍了ERBAC——一种TRBAC模型的事件驱动扩展，它允许一般反应策略的规范和实施——及其实现。尽管ERBAC的几乎所有特性都是在以前的模型中单独出现的，但是策略语言的详细设计、它在XACML中的实现以及它的测试都有助于开发有表现力的、事件驱动的策略框架，因为它们证明了这种丰富的模型可以令人满意地实现，并且它的表现力和性能与各种实际的应用程序场景兼容。特别是，许多例子说明了ERBAC的表达能力，以及它以灵活的方式处理异常情况的能力，同时保持策略的紧凑和可管理性。原型扩展了XACML的语言和PDP的实现，以支持新的模型。系统的可扩展性实验表明，ERBAC中策略规则评估的计算成本与现实世界中的应用是兼容的。
papers.title_zh: 事件驱动的RBAC

papers.title: Probabilistic cost enforcement of security policies
papers.authors: Yannis Mallios, Lujo Bauer, Dilsun Kirli Kaynar, Fabio Martinelli, Charles Morisset
papers.title_zh: 安全策略的概率成本实施

papers.title: From qualitative to quantitative proofs of security properties using first-order conditional logic
papers.authors: Joseph Y. Halpern
papers.abstract: Security protocols, such as key-exchange and key management protocols, are short, but notoriously difficult to prove correct. Flaws have been found in numerous protocols, ranging from the the 802.11 Wired Equivalent Privacy (WEP) protocol used to protect link-layer communications from eavesdropping and other attacks to standards and proposed standards for Secure Socket Layer to Kerberos. Not surprisingly, a great deal of effort has been devoted to proving the correctness of such protocols. There are two largely disjoint approaches. The first essentially ignores the details of cryptography by assuming perfect cryptography and an adversary that controls the network. The second approach applies the tools of modern cryptography to proving correctness, using more quantitative arguments.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全协议，如密钥交换和密钥管理协议，虽然简短，但众所周知很难证明其正确性。在许多协议中都发现了缺陷，从用于保护链路层通信免受窃听和其他攻击的802.11有线等效保密(WEP)协议，到用于安全套接字层的标准和提议的标准，再到Kerberos。不足为奇的是，大量的努力被用来证明这种协议的正确性。有两种截然不同的方法。第一种基本上忽略了密码学的细节，假设了完美的密码学和控制网络的对手。第二种方法应用现代密码学的工具来证明正确性，使用更多的定量论证。
papers.title_zh: 用一阶条件逻辑从定性到定量证明安全性质

papers.title: A formal analysis of the Norwegian E-voting protocol
papers.authors: Véronique Cortier, Cyrille Wiedling
papers.abstract:
Norway has used e-voting in its last political election in September 2011, with more than 25 000 voters using the e-voting option. The underlying protocol is a new protocol designed by the ERGO group, involving several actors (a bulletin box but also a receipt generator, a decryption service, and an auditor). Of course, trusting the correctness and security of e-voting protocols is crucial in that context. Formal definitions of properties such as privacy, coercion-resistance or verifiability have been recently proposed, based on equivalence properties. 
 
In this paper, we propose a formal analysis of the protocol used in Norway, w.r.t. privacy, considering several corruption scenarios. Part of this study has conducted using the ProVerif tool, on a simplified model.
papers.abstract_zh:
挪威在2011年9月的最近一次政治选举中使用了电子投票，超过25 000名选民使用了电子投票选项。底层协议是ERGO group设计的一个新协议，涉及几个参与者(一个公告栏，还有一个收据生成器、一个解密服务和一个审计器)。当然，在这种情况下，信任电子投票协议的正确性和安全性是至关重要的。基于等价性质，最近提出了诸如隐私、抗胁迫或可验证性等性质的正式定义。

在本文中，我们提出了一个协议的形式分析在挪威使用，w.r.t .隐私，考虑几个腐败场景。这项研究的一部分是使用ProVerif工具在一个简化的模型上进行的。
papers.title_zh: 挪威电子投票协议的形式化分析

papers.title: Designing privacy-preserving interval operations based on homomorphic encryption and secret sharing techniques
papers.authors: Stefan Wüller, Daniel A. Mayer, Fabian Förg, Samuel Schüppen, Benjamin Assadsolimani, Ulrike Meyer, Susanne Wetzel
papers.abstract: This paper introduces two-party protocols for various operations on two integer intervals that are privacy-preserving in the semi-honest model. Specifically, this work proposes new protocols for determining whether two intervals overlap; computing the boundaries and size of the overlap; and selecting a random sub-interval within the overlap. The protocols are presented both for homomorphic encryption and for secret sharing as basic secure multi-party computation techniques. Moreover, this paper presents a comprehensive performance evaluation of the newly-developed protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了在半诚实模型下，两个整数区间上的各种隐私保护操作的两方协议。具体来说，这项工作提出了新的协议，以确定两个区间是否重叠；计算重叠的边界和大小；以及在重叠内选择随机子间隔。该协议是针对同态加密和秘密共享作为基本的安全多方计算技术而提出的。此外，本文还对新开发的协议进行了全面的性能评估。
papers.title_zh: 基于同态加密和秘密共享技术设计隐私保护区间运算

papers.title: The bi-objective workflow satisfiability problem and workflow resiliency
papers.authors: Jason Crampton, Gregory Z. Gutin, Daniel Karapetyan, Rémi Watrigant
papers.abstract:
A computerized workflow management system may enforce a security policy, specified in terms of authorized actions and constraints, thereby restricting which users can perform particular steps in a workflow. The existence of a security policy may mean it is impossible to find a valid plan (an assignment of steps to authorized users such that all constraints are satisfied). Work in the literature focuses on the workflow satisfiability problem, a \emph{decision} problem that outputs a valid plan if the instance is satisfiable (and a negative result otherwise). 
In this paper, we introduce the \textsc{Bi-Objective Workflow Satisfiability Problem} (\BOWSP), which enables us to solve \emph{optimization} problems related to workflows and security policies. In particular, we are able to compute a "least bad" plan when some components of the security policy may be violated. In general, \BOWSP is intractable from both the classical and parameterized complexity point of view. We prove there exists an fixed-parameter tractable (FPT) algorithm to compute a Pareto front for \BOWSP if we restrict our attention to user-independent constraints. 
We also present a second algorithm to compute a Pareto front which uses mixed integer programming (MIP). We compare the performance of both our algorithms on synthetic instances, and show that the FPT algorithm outperforms the MIP-based one by several orders of magnitude on most of the instances. 
Finally, we study the important question of workflow resiliency and prove new results establishing that known decision problems are fixed-parameter tractable when restricted to user-independent constraints. We then propose a new way of modeling the availability of users and demonstrate that many questions related to resiliency in the context of this new model may be reduced to instances of \BOWSP.
papers.abstract_zh:
计算机化的工作流管理系统可以实施根据授权动作和约束指定的安全策略，从而限制哪些用户可以执行工作流中的特定步骤。安全策略的存在可能意味着不可能找到有效的计划(将步骤分配给授权用户，以便满足所有约束)。文献中的工作集中在工作流可满足性问题上，这是一个\emph{decision}问题，如果实例是可满足的，则输出有效的计划(否则输出否定的结果)。
在本文中，我们介绍了双目标工作流可满足性问题，它使我们能够解决与工作流和安全策略相关的优化问题。特别是，当安全策略的一些组件可能被违反时，我们能够计算出“最不坏”的计划。总的来说，从经典和参数化复杂性的观点来看，BOWSP都是难以处理的。如果我们将注意力限制在与用户无关的约束上，我们证明了存在固定参数易处理(FPT)算法来计算\BOWSP的Pareto前沿。
我们还提出了第二种算法来计算帕累托前沿，使用混合整数规划(MIP)。我们在合成实例上比较了两种算法的性能，结果表明，在大多数实例上，FPT算法的性能比基于MIP的算法高几个数量级。
最后，我们研究了工作流弹性的重要问题，并证明了新的结果，即已知的决策问题在受到与用户无关的约束时是固定参数易处理的。然后，我们提出了一种建模用户可用性的新方法，并证明了在这种新模型的上下文中，许多与弹性相关的问题都可以归结为\BOWSP的实例。
papers.title_zh: 双目标工作流可满足性问题和工作流弹性

papers.title: Prometheus: Analyzing WebInject-based information stealers
papers.authors: Andrea Continella, Michele Carminati, Mario Polino, Andrea Lanzi, Stefano Zanero, Federico Maggi
papers.abstract: Nowadays Information stealers are reaching high levels of sophistication. The number of families and variants observed increased exponentially in the last years. Furthermore, these trojans are sold on underground markets along with automatic frameworks that include web-based administration panels, builders and customization procedures. From a technical point of view such malware is equipped with a functionality, called WebInject, that exploits API hooking techniques to intercept all sensitive data in a browser context and modify web pages on infected hosts. In this paper we propose Prometheus, an automatic system that is able to analyze trojans that base their attack technique on DOM modifications. Prometheus is able to identify the injection operations performed by malware, and generate signatures based on the injection behavior. Furthermore, it is able to extract the WebInject targets by using memory forensic techniques. We evaluated Prometheus against real-world, online websites and a dataset of distinct variants of financial trojans. In our experiments we show that our approach correctly recognizes known variants of WebInject-based malware and successfully extracts the WebInject targets.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，信息窃取者正变得越来越老练。在过去的几年中，观察到的家族和变异的数量呈指数增长。此外，这些特洛伊木马程序与包括基于网络的管理面板、构建器和定制程序在内的自动框架一起在地下市场出售。从技术角度来看，这种恶意软件配备了一种称为WebInject的功能，该功能利用API挂钩技术来拦截浏览器上下文中的所有敏感数据，并修改受感染主机上的网页。在本文中，我们提出了Prometheus，一个能够分析基于DOM修改的特洛伊木马的自动系统。Prometheus能够识别恶意软件执行的注入操作，并根据注入行为生成签名。此外，它能够通过使用内存取证技术提取WebInject目标。我们根据真实世界、在线网站和一组不同的金融木马变种对Prometheus进行了评估。在我们的实验中，我们表明，我们的方法正确识别基于WebInject的恶意软件的已知变体，并成功提取WebInject目标。
papers.title_zh: 普罗米修斯:分析基于WebInject的信息窃取者
